CHAT.comment: KARI E. KENNEDY, ET AL., Petitioners v. PLAN ADMINISTRATOR FOR DUPONT SAVINGS AND INVESTMENT PLAN, ET AL.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 1:00 p.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF DAVID A. FURLOW ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
ORAL ARGUMENT BY LEONDRA R. KRUGER ON BEHALF OF AMICUS CURIAE
ORAL ARGUMENT BY MARK I. LEVY ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENTS
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT BY DAVID A. FURLOW ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
(Whereupon, at 1:56 p.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
